Description: The handle of a bifacial knife: of dark brown flint, thickest at the bottom edge and terminating in a downcurving point. Chipped along edges.
Curator's comments: Bears excavators mark. O. The flints 68755-69 are recorded in the registers of the British and Medieval Department as coming from the tomb of Djet, but 10 of this group definitely come from the tomb of Djer, and it is almost certain that the same is true of the remaining 5. See W. M. F. Petrie, 'Abydos' I (London, 1902), pl.XIV, group marked O.
